title: march 29: the terracotta army (with Alaina Castillo)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about one of the most fascinating archeological discoveries of all time: the Chinese Terracotta Army. Then, she is joined by special guest Alaina Castillo. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
